SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.3_0: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.3_1: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kkacana kecana //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.5_0: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.8_1: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.9_0: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.9_1: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.12_0: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_1.13_1: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.1_0: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.2_0: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.2_1: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.5_1: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.8_0: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.10_0: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.11_0: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.11_1: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.13_0: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.14_0: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.15_0: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.18_0: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.18_1: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.19_0: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.19_1: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.21_1: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.22_0: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.23_0: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.24_0: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_2.25_1: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_3.1_0: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_3.2_0: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_3.2_1: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_3.6_1: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_3.9_0: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_4.3_1: akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt nāstyakāryaṃ ca kāraṇam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_4.8_0: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_4.9_0: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_5.2_0: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kkacit /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_5.5_0: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_5.7_0: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_5.7_1: ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_5.8_0: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_5.8_1: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_6.1_1: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_6.2_0: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_6.2_1: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_6.4_0: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_6.10_0: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.3_1: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.6_0: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.9_1: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.10_1: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.11_0: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.13_1: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.17_1: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.24_1: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.25_0: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.32_0: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_7.34_0: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.1_0: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.2_0: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.2_1: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.4_0: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.4_1: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.5_1: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.8_0: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.8_1: kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_8.12_0: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.3_1: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.4_1: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.7_0: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.8_0: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.9_1: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.11_1: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_9.12_0: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_10.5_0: anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_10.6_1: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_10.10_1: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_10.16_0: ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_11.2_0: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_11.6_1: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_11.7_0: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_11.7_1: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_11.8_0: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.1_1: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.2_0: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.3_0: yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.4_1: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.5_1: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.6_1: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.7_1: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.8_0: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_12.10_0: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_13.1_1: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_13.2_0: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_13.3_1: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_13.5_1: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_13.7_1: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_14.1_0: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_14.2_0: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_14.8_0: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_14.8_1: saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_15.2_0: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_15.2_1: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_15.4_1: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_15.6_0: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_15.6_1: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_15.11_0: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_16.1_0: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_16.1_1: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_16.5_1: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_16.8_0: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_16.10_1: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.1_1: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.5_1: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.11_1: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.13_0: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.15_0: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.18_0: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.19_1: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.20_0: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.22_1: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.24_0: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.26_0: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.26_1: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.27_1: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.28_1: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.30_0: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.30_1: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.31_1: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.32_0: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_17.33_0: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_18.3_0: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_18.3_1: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_18.8_0: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_18.10_0: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_19.5_0: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_19.6_1: na ca kaścana bhāvo 'sti kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.1_0: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.1_1: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.2_0: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.2_1: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.3_1: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.4_0: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.9_0: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.11_1: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.13_0: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.14_0: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.15_0: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.15_1: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.19_0: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.19_1: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.23_1: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_20.24_1: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.1_0: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.1_1: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.2_0: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.2_1: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.3_1: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.4_0: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.4_1: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.5_1: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.6_1: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.7_1: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.8_0: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.8_1: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.13_0: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.13_1: na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.14_1: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.18_0: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.18_1: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.20_1: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.21_0: evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_21.21_1: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.1_0: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.2_1: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.3_1: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.4_0: yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.11_1: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.14_1: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_22.15_1: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.2_1: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.4_0: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.4_1: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.5_0: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.7_1: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.9_0: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.12_0: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.13_1: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.14_1: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.15_0: yena gṛṇhāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.16_0: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.20_0: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.21_0: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.21_1: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.22_0: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.22_1: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.24_0: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_23.24_1: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.1_0: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.2_0: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.3_1: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.4_0: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.5_0: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.7_0: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.7_1: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.9_1: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.11_1: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.14_0: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.14_1: sarvaṃ na yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.17_0: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.17_1: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.21_1: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.23_0: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.24_1: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.25_0: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.29_0: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.29_1: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.30_1: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.31_0: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.31_1: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.33_0: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.33_1: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.34_0: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.34_1: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.35_0: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_24.40_1: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.1_0: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.4_1: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.5_0: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.5_1: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.6_1: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.7_0: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.7_1: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.13_1: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.15_1: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.16_0: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.16_1: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.17_1: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.18_1: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.20_0: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_25.23_1: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_26.4_0: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_26.8_0: pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ bhavājjātiḥ pravartate /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.3_1: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.7_1: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.9_1: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.10_0: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.10_1: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.15_0: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.15_1: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.17_1: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavetacca na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.19_1: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.21_0: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:ms_27.26_1: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate //
